sentences.en: a dapper little man in a grey suit
sentences.cn: 一身灰西装、打扮利落的小个子男人

sentences.en: By week's end Dave came by dapper in a dark suit.
sentences.cn: 到了周末时,戴夫来看望我.他穿着一套深色的西装,显得十分潇洒.

sentences.en: By week's end Dave came by looking dapper in a dark suit.
sentences.cn: 到了周末时,戴夫来看望我.

sentences.en: He was a dapper little Irishman, very vain, homely as a monkey.
sentences.cn: 他是个短小精干的爱尔兰人, 非常自负, 丑得象只猴子.

sentences.en: He was a young history don , a short , plump man, dapper in dress.
sentences.cn: 他是一位年轻的历史学教师, 矮小圆胖, 穿着干净利落.

sentences.en: He will have an inferiority if you are happy and dapper.
sentences.cn: 他看到你现在这么潇洒快乐,一定很自卑.

sentences.en: His dapper self - confidence seemed impenetrable to such hints.
sentences.cn: 这类的暗示似乎动摇不了他坚定的 自信.

sentences.en: His manner was aristocratic , his movements dapper and suave.
sentences.cn: 他气宇轩昂, 温文尔雅,举止潇洒.

sentences.en: Humphrey was outwardly dapper and composed as usual.
sentences.cn: 汉弗莱同往常一样衣着整齐,镇定自若.

sentences.en: In person Dr. Proudie is a good - looking man, spruce and dapper and very tidy.
sentences.cn: 就仪表而言,普劳迪博士是一位仪表堂堂的人,潇洒, 漂亮,十分整饬.

sentences.en: Mr Ohtsubo, 64, is dapper and intense in conversation.
sentences.cn: 64岁的大坪文雄衣冠楚楚, 与人交谈时认真投入.

sentences.en: Other dapper statue, face different attitude, well that life.
sentences.cn: 其他塑像衣冠楚楚, 面姿各异, 惟妙惟肖,栩栩如生.

sentences.en: The once dapper , cheerful agent had become seedy looking and bitter.
sentences.cn: 昔日风度翩翩、容光焕发的经纪人,今天变成了衣衫褛褴, 蓬头垢面的人.
你看上去非常衣冠楚楚.

sentences.en: You will look very dapper in a silk leisure suit.
sentences.cn: 真丝休闲西服,令您风姿翩翩.

sentences.en: Your most dapper and distinguished - looking gentleman is George Clooney ( 40 % ).
sentences.cn: 乔治·克鲁尼的清爽长相让他以40%的票数赢得了最帅绅士 称号.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指男子）整洁漂亮的，动作敏捷的
trans.tran_en: a man who is dapper is nicely dressed, has a neat appearance, and is usually small or thin

trans.tran_cn: (Dapper)人名；(英)达珀；(意)达珀尔；(德)达佩尔
